titleStmt.title: A testimony of the ministers in the county of Stafford to the trueth of Jesus Christ, and to the Solemn League and Covenant, as also against the errours, heresies, and blasphemies of these times, and the toleration of them. Sent up to the ministers within the province of London, subscribers of the first testimony.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, b. 1620 or 21.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Macock, for George Calvert, at the sign of the Half-Moon in Watlingstreet, near Austine's Gate,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: John Taylor [and 37 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
